content: Quando mi sono reso conto che ero Dio? Beh, stavo pregando e improvvisamente mi sono reso conto che stavo parlando con me stesso.
translations: eng:When did I realize I was Godï¹– Well, I was praying and I suddenly realized I was talking to myself
